views.markdown:
– Fixed crash some users experienced. – Added dark mode for iOS 13.
– Fixed the weird dimensions related to rotation lock.
– Rotates view on iPad if using it upside down.
– Restores the previous key window when dismissing.


– iOS 13 support (thanks shepgoba).
– Center window horizontally on screen.
v1.6.4
* Layout changes – it's now easier to hit the knobs. Got rid of all sharp edges.
* Now detects if a color hex is in the pasteboard when invoking libcolorpicker. If it is, an alert will ask if this value should be used (iOS 8 and above).
* Fixed a weird memory crash on iOS 10.
* Fixed a weird initial slider appearance glitch on iOS 7 and iOS 8.
* Fixed iPad landscape layout.
v1.6.3-1
- Fixed the hex button crashing.
- Fixed the hue not updating when having no saturation.
- Fixed the hue knob acting in an unpredictable way by restricting how far away touches will affect the knob.
- Fixed an ARC issue where libcolorpicker in some cases would dismiss right after invoke.
- Now compiled with both Xcode 9 and 10 to avoid arm64 from not running on iOS 8 and below.
v1.6.3
- Official A12 support.
- Dragging the hue knob is now silky smooth.
- Several other code improvements.
